original: ‘iti kho, bhikkhave, āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesi, uḷārāya ca maṁ pūjāya pūjesī’ti.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave āḷāraḥ kālāmaḥ ācariyaḥ me samānaḥ antevāsim mam samānam attanā samasamam ṭhapesi uḷārāya ca mam pūjāya pūjesi iti

original: ‘na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
analyzed: na me ācariyaḥ atthi sadisaḥ me na vijjati

original: Sadevakasmiṁ lokasmiṁ, natthi me paṭipuggalo’ti, tena hi ‘iti kho, bhikkhave, āḷāro
analyzed: sa devakasmiṃ lokasmi natthi me paṭipuggalo ti tena hi iti kho bhikkhave āḷāro

original: kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: kālāmaḥ ācariyaḥ me samānaḥ antevāsim mam samānam attanā samasamam ṭhapesi iti yam tam micchā

original: ‘iti kho, bhikkhave, āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesī’ti, tena hi ‘na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave āḷāraḥ kālāmaḥ ācariyaḥ me samānaḥ antevāsim mam samānam attanā samasamam ṭhapesi iti tena hi na me ācariyaḥ atthi sadisaḥ me na vijjati

original: Sadevakasmiṁ lokasmiṁ, natthi me paṭipuggalo’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: sa devakasmiṃ lokasmi natthi me paṭipuggalo ti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: ‘iti kho, bhikkhave, āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesi, uḷārāya ca maṁ pūjāya pūjesī’ti.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave āḷāraḥ kālāmaḥ ācariyaḥ me samānaḥ antevāsim mam samānam attanā samasamam ṭhapesi uḷārāya ca mam pūjāya pūjesi iti

original: Tañca pana vacanaṁ pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ācariyabhāvaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ.
analyzed: tat ca pana vacanam pubbā iva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa iva sato ācariya bhāvam sandhāya bhāsita

original: Pañcime, mahārāja, pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato ācariyā, yehi anusiṭṭho bodhisatto tattha tattha divasaṁ vītināmesi.
analyzed: pañcime mahā rāja pubbā iva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sataḥ ācariyāḥ yehi anusiṭṭhaḥ bodhisatto tattha tattha divasam vītināmesi

original: Ye te, mahārāja, aṭṭha brāhmaṇā jātamatte bodhisatte lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhiṁsu, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja aṭṭha brāhmaṇāḥ jāta matte bodhisatte lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhisu

original: rāmo dhajo lakkhaṇo mantī yañño suyāmo subhojo sudattoti.
analyzed: rāmaḥ dhajaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ mantī yañño suyāmaḥ subhojaḥ sudatto ti

original: Te tassa sotthiṁ pavedayitvā rakkhākammaṁ akaṁsu, te ca paṭhamaṁ ācariyā.
analyzed: te tassa sotthim pavedayitvā rakkhā kammam te ca paṭhamam ācariyā

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, bodhisattassa pitā suddhodano rājā yaṁ tena samayena abhijātaṁ
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja bodhisattassa pitā suddhodanaḥ rājā yam tena samayena abhijāta

original: udiccajātimantaṁ padakaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ chaḷaṅgavantaṁ sabbamittaṁ nāma brāhmaṇaṁ upanetvā
analyzed: udicca jātimantam padakam veyyākaraṇam chaḷaṅgavantam sabbamittam nāma brāhmaṇam upanetvā

original: sovaṇṇena bhiṅgārena udakaṁ oṇojetvā ‘imaṁ kumāraṁ sikkhāpehī’ti adāsi, ayaṁ dutiyo ācariyo.
analyzed: sovaṇṇena bhiṅgārena udakam oṇojetvā imam kumāram sikkhāpehi iti adāsi ayam dutiyaḥ ācariyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, yā sā devatā bodhisattaṁ saṁvejesi, yassā vacanaṁ sutvā bodhisatto saṁviggo ubbiggo tasmiṁyeva khaṇe nekkhammaṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji, ayaṁ tatiyo ācariyo.
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja yā sā devatā bodhisattam savejesi yassāḥ vacanam sutvā bodhisatto saviggaḥ ubbiggaḥ tasmiya eva khaṇe nekkhammam nikkhamitvā pabbaji ayam tatiyaḥ ācariyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, āḷāro kālāmo ākiñcaññāyatanassa parikammaṁ ācikkhi, ayaṁ catuttho ācariyo.
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja āḷāraḥ kālāmaḥ ākiñcaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ ācikkhi ayam catutthaḥ ācariyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, udako rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṁ ācikkhi, ayaṁ pañcamo ācariyo.
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja udakaḥ rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammam ācikkhi ayam pañcamaḥ ācariyo

original: Ime kho, mahārāja, pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato pañca ācariyā.
analyzed: ime kho mahā rāja pubbā iva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato pañca ācariyāḥ

original: Te ca pana ācariyā lokiye dhamme.
analyzed: te ca pana ācariyāḥ lokiye dhamme

original: Imasmiñca pana, mahārāja, lokuttare dhamme sabbaññutañāṇappaṭivedhāya natthi tathāgatassa
analyzed: imasmin ca pana mahā rāja lokuttare dhamme sabbaññuta ñāṇa ppaṭivedhāya na atthi tathāgatassa

original: anuttaro anusāsako, sayambhū, mahārāja, tathāgato anācariyako, tasmā kāraṇā tathāgatena bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: anuttaraḥ anusāsakaḥ sayambhu mahā rāja tathāgataḥ tasmā kāraṇā tathāgatena bhaṇita
sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti
